strings.STR_TUTORIAL_JUMP_MOBILE: Tap right side of screen to jump
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_FLIP_DESKTOP: Press and hold up to flip
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_FLIP_MOBILE: Tap and hold right side of screen to flip
strings.STR_TUTORIAL_SLIDE_MOBILE: Tap left side of screen to slide
strings.STR_BILLBOARDS_JUMP_MOBILE_1:
TAP RIGHT OF SCREEN 
 TO JUMP
strings.STR_BILLBOARDS_SLIDE_MOBILE_1:
TAP LEFT OF SCREEN 
 TO SLIDE
strings.STR_SHOP_MAGNET_1: Increases the duration of the Coin Magnet.
strings.STR_SHOP_MAGNET_2: Increases the duration of the Coin Magnet.
strings.STR_SHOP_MAGNET_3: Increases the duration of the Coin Magnet.
strings.STR_SHOP_MAGNET_4: Increases the duration of the Coin Magnet
strings.STR_SHOP_FLIP_1: Increases the speed the player rotates when performing a flip.
strings.STR_SHOP_FLIP_2: Increases the speed the player rotates when performing a flip.
strings.STR_SHOP_FLIP_3: Increases the speed the player rotates when performing a flip.
strings.STR_SHOP_FLIP_4: Increases the speed the player rotates when performing a flip.
strings.STR_SHOP_GRIND_1: Gives you a score bonus when you're grinding.
strings.STR_SHOP_GRIND_2: Gives you a score bonus when you're grinding.
strings.STR_SHOP_GRIND_3: Gives you a score bonus when you're grinding.
strings.STR_SHOP_GRIND_4: Gives you a score bonus when you're grinding.
strings.STR_SHOP_SMASHES_1: Increases your multiplier when you smash an obstacle.
strings.STR_SHOP_SMASHES_2: Increases your multiplier when you smash an obstacle.
strings.STR_SHOP_SMASHES_3: Increases your multiplier when you smash an obstacle.
strings.STR_SHOP_SMASHES_4: Increases your multiplier when you smash an obstacle.
strings.STR_GOALS_SMASH_LEVEL_1: Smash 2 crates or barrels in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_SMASH_LEVEL_2: Smash 10 crates or barrels in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_SMASH_LEVEL_3: Smash 20 crates or barrels in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_SMASH_LEVEL_4: Smash 30 crates or barrels in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_SMASH_LEVEL_5: Smash 50 crates or barrels in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_1: Get a single trick score of 200
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_2: Get a single trick score of 4000
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_3: Get a single trick score of 10000
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_4: Get a single trick score of 15000
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_5: Get a single trick score of over 17500
strings.STR_GOALS_SCORE_TRICK_LEVEL_6: Get a single trick score of over 20000
strings.STR_GOALS_DOUBLE_FLIP_LEVEL_2: Double flip 3 times in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_DOUBLE_FLIP_LEVEL_4: Double flip 10 times in one run
strings.STR_GOALS_TRIPLE_FLIP_LEVEL_2: Triple flip 5 times in one run
